Distributive law for Cartesian product over intersection.  Similar to Theorem 102 of [Suppes] p. 52.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2004.)

 Distributive law for cross product over intersection.  Similar to Theorem 102 of [Suppes] p. 52.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Sep-2004.)
statement: xpindir $p |- ( ( A i^i B ) X. C ) = ( ( A X. C ) i^i ( B X. C ) ) $.
